synopsis.text: Mini spin-off series of Tokyo Revengers, now streaming on the anime's official YouTube channel! Directed by Minoru Ashina, these special episodes offer a delightful glimpse into the everyday routines of the beloved Tokyo Manji gang members and the five Mizo middle schoolers â€“ a side of their lives you won't see in the main anime. Dive into the lighter side of Tokyo Revengers with Chib Reve!
